column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Truffle Mac n Cheese - this was baked on top
column2: but also had a creamy white cheddar base.  The pasta was perfectly al dente
column3: which sometimes hard to do with baked pasta.  The black truffle was pretty subtle
column4: but just the hint of it gave it a slight earthy flavor.  I happily ate every bite of this large side.  5 stars
